election_record.label: New Hampshire 1825 U.S. House of Representatives, Special

candidate.name: Anderson
candidate.note: Listed in Original Election Returns as Old Anderson.

overview.note: Election to replace James Miller, who resigned on January 3, 1825.
The official return for Titus Brown, without the rejected towns, was 18258.
